entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
